SEARCH
Package UIs

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
UIs.Menu
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyerMenu, SellerMenu
public abstract class Menu extends Object
The Menu class is an abstract class that serves as the base for various user menus in UniShop. It provides common attributes and methods for handling user interaction and menu navigation.

      public abstract boolean displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the user and handles user input.
      Returns:
      True if the menu should continue looping, false otherwise.
